select `documents`.* from `documents` where `documents`.`id` = ? and `documents`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1

select `statuses`.*, `document_statuses`.`document_id` as `pivot_document_id`, `document_statuses`.`status_id` as `pivot_status_id`, `document_statuses`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `document_statuses`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `statuses` inner join `document_statuses` on `statuses`.`id` = `document_statuses`.`status_id` where `document_statuses`.`document_id` = ? and `document_statuses`.`deleted_at` is null and `statuses`.`deleted_at` is null

select `service_levels`.*, `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`asset_warranty_id` as `pivot_asset_warranty_id`, `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`service_level_id` as `pivot_service_level_id`, `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `service_levels` inner join `asset_warranty_service_levels` on `service_levels`.`id` = `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`service_level_id` where `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`deleted_at` is null and `asset_warranty_service_levels`.`asset_warranty_id` in (?, ?) and `service_levels`.`deleted_at` is null
